column15: Description

Ingrid left a street mass in commemoration of the New Year and was later found dead on Rua Cardoso Moreira with gunshot wounds to the back.

Jessica was detained and beaten for no apparent reason by police members. She was then taken to a police station where she was again beaten and put into a cell where she died from the beatings.

The victim was shot various times by an unknown person who left the apartment on a motorbike.

The victim was described as a trans man who was having drinks with two men in a karaoke bar. When he had an argument with the the two men, one of them tok a knife and stabbed him several times.

According to the police the suspected murderers committed the murder. One of them was described as her gay lover, who killed her becaiuse of the jewellery she possessed.

Tvt project: Daily Bashkar 13.01.2012; Daily News and Analysis 13.01.2012

The victim’s body showed marks of torture. Before being shot, the victim was beaten and the hands semi-amputated. A message was left that read “Por Rata” (“By the Rat”). Neighbours had heard the shot but did not take any action.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: SDP Noticias Online 18.01.2012

According to the police, the victim was shot twice in the chest by three persons in a car after an argument.

The murder took place on Avenida Tiradentes.

Crain was killed by Tyree Davon Paschall after she tried to break off their relationship.

column8: El Roble, San Félix, Ciudad Guayana
column15:
Brilli’s body was found half-naked and with seven gunshot wounds in different body parts on 22 January 2012.

The authorities assume that she died as a consequence of a fight, but they don’t discard the possibility that the perpetrator was a client.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans: Globovision, Online 23.01.2012

Guilherme was shot thirteen times.
